text: Yang Xiong (; November 1953 – 12 April 2021) was a Chinese politician and business executive. He was Mayor of Shanghai. On 17 January 2017, Yang resigned as mayor.杨雄辞任上海市市长 He was replaced by Ying Yong.应勇当选上海市人民政府市长 - Eastday (February 4, 2017) Yang died surprisingly on 12 April 2021 at Huashan Hospital from heart failure. He was 67. == References == Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese mayors Category:Politicians from Shanghai Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:20th-century Chinese politicians
title: Yang Xiong (politician)
